nodes.text: Lower Sundari Outpost, originally known as Sundari Imperial Outpost, was an outpost located on the south edge of the Sundari Flatlands on the planet Balmorra. Built on the cliffs overlooking the Barasin Refuse Yards, the outpost was reclaimed by the Galactic Republic and the Balmorran resistance sometime between 3643 BBY and 3642 BBY.
